author: geirm
msg: Incorporated suggestions from jeff <jlb@houseofdistraction.com> removing 'questionable assumptions'
WRT discovery of iterator and added support for having a naked Iterator in the context. This
is provisional wrt some of the concerns going back and forth on the dev list, but will help us
try and work things out.  There is a large warning message squawked into the log if you use one.
Passes all tests, but will review testbed to explicitly test every iterative
type we claim to support. I think that we are covered, but want to make sure.

author: geirm
msg: Added support to set the line,column for directives, so they can put out better log messages

author: geirm
msg: Added three new methods and two ints to allow pluggable directives to know where they are in the
template for more useful log messages.

author: dlr
msg: JavaDoc'd getResource(String resourceName, int resourceType) method.

author: dlr
msg: Added a tad of JavaDoc to getTemplate(String).
